plot: The reunion concludes as the ladies discuss Kelly's season of dating and zingy one-liners. Emily, Shannon, Kelly and Gina have trouble seeing eye-to-eye on the events at Eddie's birthday party. The ladies relive the humidity, shenanigans and tension from their Jamaica trip. Then they take a deeper dive into Tamra and Shannon's merry-go-round of a friendship, as well as what exactly happened to cause Shannon's meltdown in Jamaica. The ladies close out the season with revealing their list of regrets and tequila shots.
